plot: The daughter of the last Russian Tsar, Nicolas II, Anastasia is found by two Russian con men, Dimitri and Vladimir, who seek the reward that her grandmother, the Dowager Empress Marie, promised to the ones who'll find her. But the evil mystic of the Tsar family, Rasputin, still wants the Romanov family to be destroyed forever.

m.role: Mr. Fanservice: Dimitri. When they originally animated him, they actually thought he was too "obviously cute" - so they added the bump on his nose to tone it down. It backfired.

f.role: Big Beautiful Woman: Sophie is very fun and kind-hearted, as well as really big.
Sophie from Anastasia is a beautiful, full-bodied Russian blonde of minor Noble position and great wealth living in Paris and housing the former Ruling family.

Anastasia - while the real Anastasia was royalty, she is recognised as "Grand Duchess" rather than princess. But the film frequently refers to her as a princess just to avoid confusion. In a twist, she also  gives up the title and chooses to elope with Dimitri.

Everything's Better with Princesses: The real Anastasia was recognised as "Grand Duchess". While the movie does drop the Grand Duchess title a couple of times, most characters use "princess" for convenience's sake.
Anastasia, at the climax of the film, Anastasia defeats the Big Bad wearing a fine ballroom dress.

name: Anastasia
